name: Credit/Debit-card-reader
tagline: Credit/Debit Card Reader through media jack on any Android devices
body:
### Welcome to GitHub Pages.
This is an Android application development project. 
Now-a-days it is a growing need to Pay User's shopping bill, restaurant bill, any kind of shopping bill through user's mobile devices. So for that I have generated this repository which reads User's credit/debit card information easily and give them satisfaction of paying bill through user's android devices. After this, you can check out the code branch:

```
$ cd saurabh9890/Credit-Debit-Card-Reader/src/
$ git fetch origin
$ git checkout gh-pages
```

If you're using the GitHub for Mac, simply sync your repository and you'll see the new branch.

### Designer Templates
For the sake of user, I have generated this repository which reads user's credit/debit card information easily and give them satisfaction of paying bill through user's android devices. This card reader repository contains the Java code which reads user's Credit Card Number, Expiry Date, Name of card holder, CVV number and provides it to the Banking application for processing.
This application works exactly similar way to that as "Google Wallet" and "Squareup app".  [Squareup](https://www.squareup.com/)

### Authors and Contributors
Profile link @saurabh9890. 
For example: In 2007, Chris Wanstrath (@defunkt), PJ Hyett (@pjhyett), and Tom Preston-Werner (@mojombo) founded GitHub.

### Support or Contact
